alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 11:10AM CST until March 07 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Riverton. .Rainfall amounts of one and a half to over three inches fell last week and higher river levels will soon reach Riverton. An additional half inch to inch of rain is forecasted to fall over the Wabash River basin starting late tonight which will help maintain river levels. The Wabash at Riverton is expected to stay in flood through much of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY, MARCH 07... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to Tuesday, March 07. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Sunday /11:00 AM EST Sunday/ the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 17.3 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, March 07. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
